page.title: 10Trentham Garden's Future
page.content: The swimming pool will probably never be used again.This is because the old swimming pool would cost 1/4 of a million pounds to be renewed.Also it is now not in the Trentham Gardens plan. But they are thinking of building another one nearer.Today Trentham Gardens operates 500 acres.Part of the estate is covered by a mile long lake. The pleasure and leisure part of Trentham Gardens,(including the Italian Gardens) has been opened since about 1911.The fair has been opened for at least 15 years.Concerts are held about 3 or 4 times a year.The water skiing is for Stoke Water skiing club.
